#Q1

```{r results='hide', message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#install.packages("ggplot2")
#install.packages("ggrepel")
library(ggrepel)
library(ggplot2)
```

Reading Data

```{r}
data <- read.csv("iverRevised.csv")
```

Plotting Data

```{r}
ggplot(data, aes(x=effectiveParties, y=povertyReduction, label = country)) + geom_point(aes(color = partySystem))+ xlab("Effective number of parties") + ylab(  "% lifted from poverty by taxes & transfers") + geom_text_repel() + theme(legend.position = c(0.1, 0.8)) + geom_rug() + geom_smooth(method='lm',formula=y~x)



```
